snippet: A couple staves off the threat of eviction with help from The Neediest Cases Fund.
abstract: Editorial applauds help given by Metropolitan Council on Jewish Poverty, beneficiary agency of UJA-Federation of New York, which is supported by the New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, to Aleksander Ptselintsev and his wife to help pay back rent; notes where donations can be made.
lead_paragraph: A couple staves off the threat of eviction with help from The Neediest Cases Fund.

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations
